singlecellutils 1.0.0

Reference

Filtering

Functions for filtering features or samples.

filter_features() filter_samples()

Functions to filter features or samples using genefilter.

EpOverA() FanoOverA() MeanBelowA() MeanOverA()

Basic filter functions

Dimension reduction

Functions that provide dimension reduction techniques.

reduce_dimension()

Performs dimension reduction and adds results to the given input.

randomized_svd() approximate_svd()

Approximate or randomized singular value decomposition

isomds()

Conveinience function to run isoMDS on a SingleCellExperiment object.

umap()

Conveinience function to perform UMAP via reticulate.

Clustering

Functions for clustering

add_clustering()

Add a clustering

hdbscan()

Conveinience function to perform HDBSCAN via reticulate.

Differential expression and accessibility

Functions to perform DE analysis

lrde_test()

Tests differential expression/accessibility using logistic regression
